Get Started

New here? Follow these quick steps to onboard into our community!

Setting Up

Welcome to Learning Creative Learning! Here are some quick instructions on how to get started:

  1. Sign up for email updates
    • If you havenâ€™t done so already, sign up for our mailing list!
  2. Join the community
    • Sign up and introduce yourself to the discussion forum.
    • Add yourself to the map.
  3. Explore Week 1
    • Explore Week 1 - Introduction: watch, read, make, share, reflect, discuss, meet, and chat!

Questions?

If you have any questions, check out the FAQ, ask someone in the forum, or contact us!
